snippet.title: Stranded Sails - Explorers of the Cursed Islands | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Join our community and get the free stand alone "Prologue" (as soon as it is ready!) exclusive for our subscriber: https://bit.ly/32lYihR

** Game-Description ** 
Stranded Sails is an open world exploration farming adventure full of discoveries and quests! Along with your crew you are ship-wrecked on a mysterious archipelago. Now it's up to you to secure your survival and solve the mysteries deep in the heart of the islands – and finally escape.

** Talk with us on DISCORD **
https://discord.gg/rokapublish

** Don't forget to wishlist us on STEAM **
https://store.steampowered.com/app/943260/

Developer: Lemonbomb Entertaiment
Publisher & Co-Publisher: rokaplay & merge games
